short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Securely unlock knowledge from your business documents using GenAI. Upload docs. Ask questions. Get answers. Stay unblocked.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chat with documents using GenAI in any browser tab.

- Support for a variety of document types.
- Upload document files or web scrape (only public pages supported at the moment).
- Space allow you to organise your documents. Spaces can be shared with other users in your Docq organisation.
- Chat threads to organise your work/questions/research
- Chat with a Space mean multi document support.
- Chat with a single document ad-hoc by uploading to a chat thread.
- Azure OpenAI GPT-4o latest (EASTUS region, will move to the UK when Azure makes it available).
- Docq backend hosted in an Azure UK region so your documents remain in the UK. Indexing happens within Docq server with an embedded model.

## Whats New

### v0.4.0

- Upload/attach files to a chat thread ad-hoc
